downloadTitle: OMS Gateway with SCOM Support (Public Preview)
downloadDescription: The OMS Gateway is a proxy server that sends data from services with no internet connectivity to OMS.
detailsSection:
The OMS Gateway enables customers send data to a central server which has internet access. It is a HTTP forward proxy that supports HTTP tunneling via the HTTP CONNECT command. The Gateway can handle up to 1000 OMS concurrent connected devices if run on a 4 core CPU, 8GB Windows Server with a 1Gbps network connection. In order to use the OMS Gateway, you need to install the OMS agent on the Gateway server.

Please note that this version of the Gateway is in public preview.
systemRequirementsSection:
- Client SKU: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10

-Server SKU: W2008 R2, W2012, W2012R2
installInstructionSection:
1. Install the OMS agent on the server on which you will be installing the OMS Gateway.

2. Install the OMS Gateway.

3. Configure SCOM Management Server and Direct Agents to use the OMS Gateway to send data.
